human_lang.description: This metric categorizes the linguistic scope of the dataset, indicating how many and which types of languages are included.

Multilingual.description: The dataset contains content with more than two human languages.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 2.1').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered multilingual along with the list of languages used.

Bilingual.description: The dataset contains content with exactly two human languages.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 2.2').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered bilingual and mention the two langauges.

Monolingual (English).description: The dataset contains only English content.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 3.1').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered monolingual (English).

Monolingual (Non-English).description: The dataset contains content with exactly one language that is non-English.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered monolingual (non-English) and mention the langauge.

Unknown.description: The language(s) used in the dataset are not specified or documented.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the language of dataset is considered unknown.

N/A.description: The dataset does not contain any human language.

is_applicable.description: Set to true only if the dataset does not contain any human language.

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data does not contain any human language.
